pkgmetadata.longdescription: # fastinference> A collection of inference modules for fastai including inference speedup and interpretability## Install`pip install fastinference`There are submodules available as well via:* `pip install fastinference[interp]` - Interpretability modules such as SHAP and Feature Importance* `pip install fastinference[onnx-cpu]` - ONNX for a CPU environment* `pip install fastinference[onnx-gpu]` - ONNX for a GPU environment## Wonderful Contributors:(Using both their `fastai` handles as well as their GitHub handles if possible):* Pavel (Pak)
